title: One Good Thing Journal
description: Journaling app to encourage small wins

title: Quby Christmas AR Effect - Exar Technologies (M) Sdn. Bhd.
description: An AR installation at EcoSanctuary Mall. Users scan a festive backdrop using their phone, revealing an AR animation featuring Quby, enhancing the Christmas mall experience.

title: Chery AR TikTok Game - Exar Technologies (M) Sdn. Bhd.
description: A branded TikTok filter game where users tilt their heads to steer a car and avoid obstacles. Showcases the new Chery vehicle model through playful, viral interaction.

title: AEON AR Game - Exar Technologies (M) Sdn. Bhd.
description: An interactive head-tilting game displayed on an LCD screen. Players collect "protection points" while avoiding danger â€” designed to engage mall visitors with fun, body-based interaction.

title: Clorox Swipe Shine - Exar Technologies (M) Sdn. Bhd.
description: A swipe-to-match puzzle game inspired by Candy Crush. Users clean virtual messes to earn points - top scorers win prizes from Clorox.

title: Clorox Slithering Clean - Exar Technologies (M) Sdn. Bhd.
description: A web-based Chinese New Year game inspired by the classic Nokia snake. Players guide a cleaning snake to collect items.
